DOC.brief_summary: The study plan show whether combined hypolipemic antidiabetic therapy various daily dosage influence fast plasma glucose , insulin sensitivity proinflammatory cytokine diabetic dyslipidemic subject .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Hypolipemic Antidiabetic Treatment Cytokines
DOC.criteria: Age ( 3564yr ) Primary hyperlipidemia ( Total cholesterol > 200mg/dl , Triglycerides > 150mg/dl ) Type 2 Diabetes For woman : Menopause ( > 12 month ) Post hysterectomy Mechanical contraception Obtained informed consent Secondary hyperlipidemia Morbid obesity ( BMI > 40kg/m2 ) Alcohol drug abuse Acute chronic inflammation Congestive Heart Failure ( NYHA III IV ) Unstable Ischaemic Heart Disease Moderate severe hypertension Cancer le 5 year Chronic kidney disease ( stage IIIV ) Liver failure Oral contraception Not compliant patient Laboratory result : alanine transferase ( > 3xULN ) creatine kinase ( > 5xULN ) haemoglobin ( < 10/dl ) PLT ( < 100G/l ) WBC ( < 3,5G/l > 10G/l )
